articles.title: ESXiArgs ransomware fights off Team America's data recovery script - The Register
articles.description: Want a clue to what you’re dealing with? Check the ransom note
articles.content:
That didn't take long.
A week after the US Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Security Agency (CISA) and FBI released a recovery script to help victims of the widespread ESXiArgs ransomware attacks re… [+3817 chars]
